name: One Man Band
description:
You are a fancy, well dressed, One Man Band ready to inspire all pedestrians in the street with the power of your instruments to shot your soulful music.
Play your violin to attract pedestrians to you and direct them to your hat so they can, pleased, give you their coins!

GOAL

  • Get all coins in the less time possible.

CONTROLS

  • Press 'W' will hit your drum and let you jump
  • Press 'W' while stick on a wall, will blow your trombone and make you wall jump
  • Pressing 'SPACE' will release the notes of your violin.

(The game works with a gamepad too. Left stick to move; A_Button to jump, B_Button to play violin)

FROM THE AUTHOR

- Updated build with some sound FX.

I hope you enjoy it and thanks for playing!
